description: Detects potential DLL sideloading of DLLs that are known to be abused from suspicious locations
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
name: Abusable DLL Potential Sideloading From Suspicious Location
query: (dll.path:(*\\coreclr.dll OR *\\facesdk.dll OR *\\HPCustPartUI.dll OR *\\libcef.dll OR *\\ZIPDLL.dll) AND ((dll.path:(*\:\\Perflogs\\* OR *\:\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\\Temporary\ Internet* OR *\\Windows\\Temp\\*)) OR ((dll.path:*\:\\Users\\* AND dll.path:*\\Favorites\\*)) OR ((dll.path:*\:\\Users\\* AND dll.path:*\\Favourites\\*)) OR ((dll.path:*\:\\Users\\* AND dll.path:*\\Contacts\\*)) OR ((dll.path:*\:\\Users\\* AND dll.path:*\\Pictures\\*))))
